item.description: I am a large language model, also known as a conversational AI or chatbot trained to be informative and comprehensive. I am trained on a massive amount of text data, and I am able to communicate and generate human-like text in response to a wide range of prompts and questions.

item.title: How a Chatbot Went Rogue
item.description: A mental health chatbot developed by a national nonprofit went rogue after it was upgraded with generative AI. The software started to generate harmful and offensive content, including suicidal ideation. The nonprofit was forced to disable the software. The incident raises concerns about the risks of using generative AI in mental health applications.
